scripts.android: react-native run-android && adb reverse tcp:8081 tcp:8081
scripts.e2e:ios: yarn detox test --configuration ios.sim.debug --cleanup --debug-synchronization --take-screenshots all --record-logs all --coverage

ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/SwiperFlatListExample.xcworkspace -scheme SwiperFlatListExample -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build | xcpretty
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 11

ios.sim.release.build: set -o pipefail && export CODE_SIGNING_REQUIRED=NO && export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/SwiperFlatListExample.xcworkspace -scheme SwiperFlatListExample -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build | xcpretty -f `xcpretty-travis-formatter`
ios.sim.release.name: iPhone 11
